name: wamr-aot
install-command: git clone https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-micro-runtime.git --depth 1 wamr-aot && cd wamr-aot/product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm && cd ../../../../wamr-compiler && ./build_llvm.sh && mkdir -p build && cd build && if [ "$(uname -s)" = "Darwin" ]; then cmake .. -DWAMR_BUILD_PLATFORM=darwin; else cmake ..; fi && make && cp wamrc ../../bin/wamrc
desc: WebAssembly Micro Runtime (WAMR) with Ahead-Of-Time (AOT) compilation support.
update-command: cd wamr-aot && git pull && cd product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')/build && make && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm && cd ../../../../wamr-compiler/build && make && cp wamrc ../../bin/wamrc
